de.japi.components

Class Japi2Image

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Image
      • java.awt.image.BufferedImage
        • de.japi.components.Japi2Image
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.RenderedImage, java.awt.image.WritableRenderedImage, java.awt.Transparency

    public class Japi2Image
extends java.awt.image.BufferedImage
    A simple custom image with the simple mission to prevent the user from calling the graphic's dispose() method. Due to the fact that the graphic is modified multiple times a dispose call would clear the image and all subsequet modifications will be done on a cleared graphic or with other settings. To dispose the graphic, the method dispose() can be used.
